title: Lipstick Trace
description: Two unlikely young boys become best friends and fall in love with the same things; women, glam rock, and in some ways each other. Follow Quincy Abrams & William Denslie as they form a band in a world that is in a boy band decline of the early 2000â€™s. Together they overcome questions on sexuality, friendship, and the limitations of true love.
author: Chad McClendon
